page.title: 14Children's recreation
page.content: Among the children at Tideswell school the most{popular game}was rounders. Also popular, was hopscotch; a game with a grid drawn on the ground with numbers one to eight.You have to throw a stone on number one and hop to number eight and back,then pick up the stone and hop over the square. Cricket is a bat and ball game enjoyed mostly by boys in the summer. In winter they play football. { Favourite toys}vary with the age of the child.Younger children, girls and boys like teddy bears. Older children in the eight to ten age group like model farm machines or cars. Computers seem to be more popular with boys. A list of more unusual toys would include:Big Wig: teddy bear, Zoid; Mechanical robot; a robot that changes into a car; Roland Rat and puppets.
